mapper.select: select id, name, state, remark, order_no, create_by, create_dept, create_time, update_by, update_time, course_id, course_name from db_heima_mm.st_catalog where id = #{id}
select id, name, state, remark, order_no, create_by, create_dept, create_time, update_by, update_time, course_id, course_name from db_heima_mm.st_catalog limit #{offset}, #{limit}
mapper.insert: insert into db_heima_mm.st_catalog(name, state, remark, order_no, create_by, create_dept, create_time, update_by, update_time, course_id, course_name) values (#{name}, #{state}, #{remark}, #{orderNo}, #{createBy}, #{createDept}, #{createTime}, #{updateBy}, #{updateTime}, #{courseId}, #{courseName})

insert into db_heima_mm.st_catalog(name, state, remark, order_no, create_by, create_dept, create_time, update_by, update_time, course_id, course_name) values
(#{entity.name}, #{entity.state}, #{entity.remark}, #{entity.orderNo}, #{entity.createBy}, #{entity.createDept}, #{entity.createTime}, #{entity.updateBy}, #{entity.updateTime}, #{entity.courseId}, #{entity.courseName})

insert into db_heima_mm.st_catalog(name, state, remark, order_no, create_by, create_dept, create_time, update_by, update_time, course_id, course_name) values
(#{entity.name}, #{entity.state}, #{entity.remark}, #{entity.orderNo}, #{entity.createBy}, #{entity.createDept}, #{entity.createTime}, #{entity.updateBy}, #{entity.updateTime}, #{entity.courseId}, #{entity.courseName})
on duplicate key update name = values(name) , state = values(state) , remark = values(remark) , order_no = values(order_no) , create_by = values(create_by) , create_dept = values(create_dept) , create_time = values(create_time) , update_by = values(update_by) , update_time = values(update_time) , course_id = values(course_id) , course_name = values(course_name)
mapper.update:
update db_heima_mm.st_catalog
name = #{name},
state = #{state},
remark = #{remark},
order_no = #{orderNo},
create_by = #{createBy},
create_dept = #{createDept},
create_time = #{createTime},
update_by = #{updateBy},
update_time = #{updateTime},
course_id = #{courseId},
course_name = #{courseName},
where id = #{id}
